item.title: Abril Paper Tech shares make weak debut, list at  ₹48.80 on BSE SME, a discount off 20% from IPO price

review.headline_rewrite: Abril Paper Tech shares make weak debut, list at  ₹48.80 on BSE SME, a discount off 20% from IPO price
bullets: Abril Paper Tech IPO Listing: Abril Paper Tech shares made a weak debut on the bourses on Friday, September 5, listing at ₹48.80on BSE
Abril Paper Tech IPO garnered robust interest from investors, closing with a total subscription of 11.20 times.
Abril Paper Tech’s ₹13.42 crore SME IPO comprised entirely of a fresh issue of 0.22 crore shares, with no offer-for-sale portion.
The company plans to deploy the proceeds towards purchasing advanced machinery for capacity expansion, meeting working capital needs, funding general corporate expenses, and supporting

item.title: Stocks to buy: Rajesh Palviya of Axis Sec suggests Muthoot Finance, Nykaa, Syrma shares today

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy: Rajesh Palviya of Axis Sec suggests Muthoot Finance, Nykaa, Syrma shares today
bullets: The Nifty 50 index kicked off at 24,818.85, rising by 84.55 points or 0.34 percent, while the BSE Sensex climbed 294.41 points or 0.36
For the past seven consecutive weeks, the Nifty 50 has been consolidating within 25,200-24,300 levels, signalling short-term consolidation and a sideways trend.

item.title: Lenders of bankrupt Jaiprakash Associates to meet Friday; challenge process among 5 bidders likely

review.headline_rewrite: Lenders of bankrupt Jaiprakash Associates to meet Friday; challenge process among 5 bidders likely
bullets: JAL was admitted into the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP) through the National Company Law Tribunal, Allahabad Bench, order dated June 3, 2024.
